    • Method Detail

      • addLike

        public SirqulResponse addLike(Long accountId,
                     Enums.ClassNameApiMap likableType,
                     Long likableId,
                     Enums.PermissionableType permissionableType,
                     Long permissionableId,
                     Boolean like,
                     String appKey,
                     Location location)
                       throws SirqulException
        Allows a user to like or dislike accounts, albums, album contests, assets, game levels, notes, and theme descriptors. Multiple likes\dislikes on the same object will replace the previous one.

        Target API Endpoint: /like
        Parameters:
        accountId - The unique accountId that made the request (either deviceId or accountId must be used)
        likableType - The type of likable object {ALBUM, ALBUM_CONTEST, ASSET, GAME_LEVEL, NOTE, THEME_DESCRIPTOR}
        likableId - The id of the likable object
        permissionableType - This is used for sending out group notifications. For example, when someone likes an asset which is also a part of an album, everyone in the album will receive a notification. This is achieved by passing in the permissionable type (in this case "album"), and the permissionable id (the album id). Possible types: {ALBUM, ALBUM_CONTEST, GAME_LEVEL, THEME_DESCRIPTOR}
        permissionableId - The id of the permissionable object (for sending group notifications)
        like - determines whether the user likes or dislikes the object
        appKey - the application key. Maps to "gameType".
        location - the current location of the user
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • removeLike

        public SirqulResponse removeLike(Long accountId,
                        Enums.ClassNameApiMap likableType,
                        Long likableId,
                        Location location)
                          throws SirqulException
        Removes a like. This will make the user "neutral".

        Target API Endpoint: /like/delete
        Parameters:
        accountId - The unique accountId that made the request (either deviceId or accountId must be used)
        likableType - The type of the likable object {ALBUM, ALBUM_CONTEST, ASSET, GAME_LEVEL, NOTE, THEME_DESCRIPTOR}
        likableId - The id of the likable object
        location - the current location of the user
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.
